entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #61788
  • Perf regression: mvc #61787
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, https, kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61786
  • OpenIdConnectOptions.CallbackPath not mapped correctly when proxied as virtual directory #61785
  • Add FallBackToDefaultCulture option to disable default‐culture fallback in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #61784
  • Analyzer warning for missing XML doc on source-generated Program class #61783
  • Support splitting validation metadata from validatable type #61781

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #61777
  • Perf improvement: json #61782
  • Create cgmanifest.json file for aspnetcore #60303

PullRequests

Updated

  • [HeaderDictionary] Reassign the underlying enumerator after calling reset #61701
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-03

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed in SourceNamedTypeSymbol.AfterMembersCompletedChecks #78433
  • Got a false CS8602 warnning when use Null-conditional operator and Null-coalescing opreator in expression #78432
  • ReduceExtensionMethod throw NullReferenceException when specifying `ref struct` symbol as receiverType #78430

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.ssms_copilot-36102.20 #78431

PullRequests

Created

  • Move RestoreUseStaticGraphEvaluation setting inside repo #78429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #78426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support interpolated string handlers in extension blocks #78425
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Ensure hover markdown for supported platforms uses non-breaking spaces for indentation #78405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change O(n) + O(lg n) search in SolutionState.SortedProjectStates to just O(lg n) #78427
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert back to scouting queue #78424
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next

Updated

  • Merge "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature to 'main' #78400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Libicu dependency on Debian 13 #115274
  • System.Text.Json AOT Polymorphic serialization #115273
  • ReadSlhDsa_Pfx_Ietf_NotSupported: CryptographicException : The specified network password is not correct. #115270
    10.0.0
  • When PublishAot=true, MsBuild's RuntimeHostConfigurationOption is not taken into account in output .runtimeconfig.json #115269
  • [NativeAOT] dotnet publish -c Release -v diag hangs at IlcCompile with <TrimmerRootAssembly Include="Npgsql"/> #115267
  • HashHelpers.GetPrime use Log2-based lookup #115266

Closed

  • Unable to build source with `DEBUGGING_SUPPORTED` undefined #37591
  • Private key loaded with X509Certificate2.CreateFromPem is not usable for ECDH on Windows #115232
    10.0.0
  • Support breakpoints on APX instructions #112588
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify Span/Memory slicing exceptions #115275
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Fix source-build validation leg #115272
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix SLH-DSA key to use SHA-1 MAC for Windows support #115271
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Metadata aggregator: removing cumulative sum for GUIDs heap offset #115268
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [WIP][Linux][EventPipe][UserEvents] Add user events eventpipe support #115265
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115257
    area-codeflow

Merged

  • Remove HMF from IL_Throw/IL_ThrowExact/IL_Rethrow #115253
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix UrlAttribute handling of relative Uris #115234
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 10.0.0
  • Dump more info in JitDump for HWIHNTRINSIC nodes #115255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Attempt to load X.509 keys as ECDH keys first #115249
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Improve Math.BigMul to fix Decimal compare perf regression #115182
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Improve crossbuild inference #115247
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2701028 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor escape analysis to be more bv-centric #115213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Consider instruction input size when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Request: Set IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract default to true #24181
    8.0.4xx

Updated

  • CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints flaky test failing in CI #46212
  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378
  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • Commit hashes inside the productCommit.txt doesn't match any repository #48801
  • `dotnet run` writes the "Using launch settings from ..." message to stdout instead of stderr #45640
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #48609

  • Add RoslynCompilerType Vbc tests #48798

  • Reduce specific test executions times #48405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
